hero.title: Enterprise Linux, the community way.
hero.description: Rocky Linux is an open-source enterprise operating system designed to be 100% bug-for-bug compatible with Red Hat Enterprise Linux<0>®</0>. It is under intensive development by the community.

features.title: Rock solid, no matter the use-case.
features.subtitle: Stable, production ready Linux
features.description: Rocky Linux rebuilds sources directly from RHEL<0>®</0>, so you can bet your best dollar that you'll have a super stable experience, no matter the use-case.

1.title: Production Ready
1.description: Rocky Linux is enterprise-ready, providing solid stability with regular updates and a 10-year support lifecycle, all at no cost.

2.title: Community Supported
2.description: The community, sponsors, and partners have invested with long-term commitments to ensure the project stays with the community.

3.title: Easy Migration
3.description: Migrate from other Enterprise Linux distributions without sweating it. We provide an easy-to-use migration script, free of charge.

latest-news.title: Latest News
latest-news.description: We regularly share updates with the community about what's happening. Here's the latest.
